verbose_text: Conversely, if the first 70 amino acids of the KNL1 N terminus are removed, which contains the PP1 binding region (KNL1 DeltaNT), then SAC silencing and MELT dephosphorylation are inhibited following MPS1 inhibition (XREF_FIG B, 2C, and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY C).
evidence: PP1 binding region (KNL1 DeltaNT ), then SAC silencing and MELT dephosphorylation
